ygData.subject: Re: Runed totem staff magic?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, it is. Not affordable, though. It sells for 30 to 40pp. It is 9dmg/37delay and +5 mana/+5 HP. Djar Lightbringer, Chancellor of HOA (Tarew Marr Server)
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, it is. Not affordable, though. It sells for 30 to 40pp. It is
9dmg/37delay and +5 mana/+5 HP.

Djar Lightbringer, Chancellor of HOA (Tarew Marr Server)
Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
http://www.hoa-rpg.com/
